survey_name: Public EV Charging Station Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of public electric vehicle charging stations to improve service quality and user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for better mobile responsiveness.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting a public EV charging station? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Ensure the question is mobile-friendly with clear instructions for multi-selection.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting a public EV charging station? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for thorough responses.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend the public EV charging stations you've used to others?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge overall satisfaction.

script.question_text: Would you recommend the public EV charging stations you've used to others?
